articles.author: Victor Goury-Laffont
articles.title: France U-turns on inviting Russia to D-Day memorial ceremony - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The prospect of a Russian presence at the Normandy commemorations drew concern from Western allies.
articles.content:
Putin took part in commemorations for the 60th D-Day anniversary in 2004, and again 10 years later for the 70th anniversary, shortly after he illegally annexed Crimea.
Russia’s past presence at D-Da… [+991 chars]

articles.author: Jenni Reid
articles.title: Euro zone inflation rises to 2.6% in May, but bloc still seen heading for interest rate cut - CNBC
articles.description: The European Central Bank is widely expected to cut interest rates next week.
articles.content: Inflation in the euro zone rose to 2.6% in May, statistics agency Eurostat said Friday, but a higher-than-expected print did not sway market bets of an interest rate cut from the European Central Ban… [+2465 chars]
